Let's see .. I think that's called the SDL ... the home page is here:
    http://www.libsdl.org/index.php <http://www.libsdl.org/index.php> 
 
... and you should be able to download a set of binary libraries specific to
your platform (Win32, etc.).  Once you have them, just decompress them into
the same Gladiator folder.
 
--Tom
